# SecureStringUtility.ToString method

Converts the specified [`SecureString`](../SecureString.md) to a normal String.

```csharp
public static string ToString(SecureString secureString)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| secureString | The [`SecureString`](../SecureString.md) to convert. |

## Return Value

A String containing the text in *secureString*.
